amendment.description: To prohibit funds made available to the Federal Transit Administration from being used for the procurement of rolling stock from manufacturers supported by certain foreign governments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3670 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3670 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503) To prohibit funds made available to the Federal Transit Administration from being used for the procurement of rolling stock from manufacturers supported by certain foreign governments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3670 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3670 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
